testcase.name: test_update
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: select c1_0.id,c1_0.address,c1_0.email,c1_0.first_name,c1_0.last_name,c1_0.phone from customer c1_0 Hibernate: select ol1_0.customer_id,ol1_0.id,ol1_0.additional_details,ol1_0.created_at,s1_0.id,s1_0.carrier,s1_0.delivery_at,s1_0.shipped_at,s1_0.shipping_address,s1_0.status,s1_0.tracking_number,ol1_0.status,ol1_0.total_amount,ol1_0.updated_at from orders ol1_0 left join shipping s1_0 on ol1_0.id=s1_0.order_id where ol1_0.customer_id=? Hibernate: select pl1_0.owner_id,pl1_0.id,pl1_0.description,pl1_0.item_name,pl1_0.price,pl1_0.quantity from product pl1_0 where pl1_0.owner_id=? Hibernate: select sc1_0.customer_id,sc1_0.id,sc1_0.count,p1_0.id,p1_0.description,p1_0.item_name,op1_0.id,op1_0.address,op1_0.email,op1_0.first_name,op1_0.last_name,op1_0.phone,p1_0.price,p1_0.quantity from shopping_cart sc1_0 left join product p1_0 on p1_0.id=sc1_0.product_id left join customer op1_0 on op1_0.id=p1_0.owner_id where sc1_0.customer_id=? Hibernate: delete from customer where id=? Hibernate: insert into customer (address,email,first_name,last_name,phone) values (?,?,?,?,?) returning id Hibernate: select c1_0.id,c1_0.address,c1_0.email,c1_0.first_name,c1_0.last_name,c1_0.phone from customer c1_0 where c1_0.id=?
